Overview

\r\n

This is the overview tab content. Tabs are a great way to organize content and improve user\r\n experience by reducing scrolling and keeping related information together.

\r\n

The SXA Tabs component supports multiple variants and can be easily customized through rendering\r\n parameters.

\r\n
\r\n\r\n
\r\n

Features

\r\n
    \r\n
  • Responsive design with mobile support

    • \r\n

    • \r\n
  • Smooth transitions
    • \r\n
  • Multiple visual variants
